# Libraries

```{r}
# Packages
library(tidyverse)
library(reticulate)
```

## Data

```{r}
# Load data
df <- readr::read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2022/2022-01-18/chocolate.csv")
print(df)
```

### R & Python
```{r}
# Store value for Python
df_pypy <- df %>% select(company_location, review_date)
```

```{python}
import pandas as pd

# Validate reticulate from Python
print(r.df_pypy)

# Store value for R
df_RR = r.df_pypy
df_RR = df_RR.filter(["company_location"]).value_counts()
```

```{r}
# Validate reticulate from R
print(py$df_RR)

py$df_RR %>% as_tibble()
```
